name: Crazy Fan !
description:
My first game made entirely by myself. Its goal is to participate in the GDA Jam 2020.

It's a very small game where you have to push the crazy fans to let the star go.

Between those who want to see it up close and the one who puts a bomb, you'll see all the colors.

The Mouse:

Right click: Blue fans
Left click: Red fans
Soft-click: Green fans

To defuse the bomb, just click on it.

You can quit the game at any time by pressing escape.

Good game ^^
